revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
void '''AdjustFloorClip'''()
== Usage == Sets the floor clipping of the Actor based on what kind of floor it's currently standing on. This is what handles making Actors appear as though their feet are under water when standing in liquid terrains. Often called after the Actor has changed its vertical position.
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]]
